interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Pumice Stone for Feet, 2 in 1 Double Sided Hard Skin Callus Remover for Feet,Hands and Body, Exfoliator Pedicure File Block Callus Remover Scrubber (Pack of 4)
Review Date: 2020/08/30
Store: KSang
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'KSang', 'Material': 'Volcanic Stone', 'Is Electric': 'No', 'Item Form': 'Scrubber, Filer', 'Unit Count': '4.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '6 x 5.6 x 2.7 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '192242957393'}
Review Text: These work great. Since stay at home order I’ve invested in doing my own pedis and these are a must! They get the job done and the colors are a cute touch!
Review Title: Works great

reference_summary:
10pcs Baby Girl Elastic Multicolor Flower Headband Rhinestone Hair Band Susenstone®610 {'Age Range (Description)': 'Baby', 'Occasion': 'Wedding, Birthday', 'Material': 'Rhinestone', 'Fabric Type': 'elastic', 'Number of Items': '10', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Manufacturer recommended age': '0 - 5 months', 'UPC': '638823006215', 'Manufacturer': 'Susenstone®'} They're beautiful and look just like the picture! everything is solid on them! I can't wait to see our baby girl in them!! They're beautiful and look just like the picture MUSE & Co Dazzling Rhinestone Stick On Nails, White Nails with Glitter Nails and Rhinestones "French Sparkle", Luxurious Elegant Nails, Squoval Medium Length Nails Press On Nails for Women and Girls Fake Nail Set 36pcs MUSENCO {'Color': 'White', 'Size': '36 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'MUSENCO', 'Style': 'French', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 4.33 x 0.79 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'MUSENCO'} Not only are they beautiful but they stay!! I’ve been so nervous to try the new stick on nails trend but decided to go in and try these. I am so comfortable with them on! I’m not scared they’re going to pop of every 2 seconds. Especially with beauty shops being shut down on and off it’s an affordable and fun way to try out new stuff! I will say I used a UV lamp I already had after applying I’ll update when I try it without the UV lamp and as the days go by to see how they hold up. Obsessed!!!! Poly Nail Gel Kit, 7 Colors Nail Extension Gel with UV Lamp, Poly Extension Decoration Kit, Base Top Coat Set with Rhinestone, Nail Molds, Complete Nail Art Gel Kits for DIY Manicure, Pink Nude Series AIFAIFA {'Color': 'Pink', 'Brand': 'AIFAIFA', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Product Dimensions': '5.9 x 5.9 x 5.9 inches; 1.5 Pounds'} Neat little set. The only thing I didn’t like about it was that the nail polish bottles weren’t labeled. Kind of messed me up at first thinking the bottom coat was the top but once I figured it out I taped the caps up so I can tell.
EDIT*** they ARE labeled!!! I’m just blind!! Neat little set MUSE & Co Dazzling Swarovski Stick On Nails, Light Pink Nails Embellished with Swarovski Crystals "Elegant Princess" Luxurious Elegant Nails, Squoval Medium Length Nails Press On Nails for Women and Girls Fake Nail Set, 36pcs MUSENCO {'Color': 'Nude', 'Size': '36 Piece Set (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'MUSENCO', 'Style': 'Art Deco', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 0.79 x 4.33 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'MUSENCO'} Got my first pair and had to get more! They’re beautiful and stick great!!!! Beautiful AOFLLU Hair Clips for Girls, 120 Pcs No Slip Metal Snap Hair Clips Barrettes for Girls Kids Women AOFLLU {'Brand': 'AOFLLU', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Child', 'Material': 'Metal', 'Occasion': "Christmas, Valentine's Day", 'Package Dimensions': '4.7 x 2.9 x 0.7 inches; 4.8 Ounces'} My daughter has very short hair and they don’t all fit up into her ponytail so we use these types of clips to pin up her fly aways. They have a strong hold and don’t fall out as easy as other brands we’ve tried! Plus the variety of colors is great so they can match her outfits. They were all accounted for as well! Highly recommend! Strong hold Pumice Stone for Feet, 2 in 1 Double Sided Hard Skin Callus Remover for Feet,Hands and Body, Exfoliator Pedicure File Block Callus Remover Scrubber (Pack of 4) KSang {'Brand': 'KSang', 'Material': 'Volcanic Stone', 'Is Electric': 'No', 'Item Form': 'Scrubber, Filer', 'Unit Count': '4.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '6 x 5.6 x 2.7 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '192242957393'} These work great. Since stay at home order I’ve invested in doing my own pedis and these are a must! They get the job done and the colors are a cute touch! Works great
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Target Audience:** Focus remains on stylish and functional products for babies, particularly girls, enhancing their appearance.
  
- **Product Type:** The user shows a strong preference for baby accessories, especially hair clips and bands, alongside an expanding interest in beauty products, including personal grooming items like exfoliators and DIY pedicure tools.

- **Occasions:** Continues to seek products for special events such as weddings and birthdays, aiming to create memorable experiences through stylish offerings.

- **Aesthetic Preferences:** Values beauty and visual appeal, with a notable appreciation for colorful, decorative items and shimmery finishes that amplify their personal style. The recent interest in beauty tools reflects a holistic approach to grooming.

- **Quality Expectations:** Maintains high standards for durability and functionality, as evidenced by positive experiences with previous beauty and accessory purchases that have met their needs.

- **Emotional Connection:** Excited about how both baby and personal beauty products contribute to style and self-care, highlighting strong familial bonds and nurturing instincts.

Overall, the user continues to explore stylish, functional baby accessories while increasingly valuing personal grooming tools that enhance their own beauty routines. Their commitment to quality, creativity, and elegance in products is evident for both themselves and their child, demonstrating a delightful approach to aesthetics in every aspect of their life.
